title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Paddling               Bicycling               Walking               Hiking             Explore the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Network Have an adventure on the Potomac Heritage NST. Explore by region and discover new adventures along the different segments of the Trail, or try exploring by activity and try something new!  Do not forget to check out the Trail's Photos and Multimedia. While you are at it, why not learn about our History & Culture, Nature, or Management? If that is not enough for you, we have Education and Bookstore opportunities to check out along the Trail too.   By Region:  C&O Canal Towpath  Great Allegheny Passage  Laurel Highlands Hiking Trail  Northern Virginia  Southern Maryland  Two Rivers  Virginia's Northern Neck Washington DC  Western Maryland  By Activity:  Backpacking Bicycling Birding Camping Civil War Cross-Country Skiing Hiking Historic Sites  History Museum/Visitor Centers  Paddling  Walking Wildlife            Explore the Potomac Heritage NST by region or activty - the adventures are endless! Photo Credit: NPS
